item.description: "Today,10 watchdog groups sent letter to Gov Hochul..urging publish over 100 COVID datasets as open data..only 14 datasets currently available..w/64 others available in format that cannot be easily used or analyzed..groups said open data help rebuild trust in state govt..."

item.title: #en @ 1435288673399017484
item.description:
Today, ten leading watchdog groups sent a letter to Governor Hochul urging her to be fully transparent about New York State's response to COVID-19.
Our groups asked Hochul to publish over one hundred COVID-19 datasets as open data.
https://t.co/TV9QR2WbMz https://t.co/kThQxWUaa7

item.title: #en @ 1435277197955174401
item.description:
Our @undptz #acclab team is on a mission to better understand the complexities of waste systems in #Tanzania using #opendata & #crowdmapping.
Learn abt what they've found out including the novel dataset they've generated here: https://t.co/64yefpAI1Z @BMZ_Bund @qatar_fund https://t.co/TnITO0Taee

item.title: #en @ 1435275364012548100
item.description:
Presentation I gave at @LeroCentre:
"Open for Science", Treats why #openscience should be the default, and how to share #preprints, and other research outputs like #opensource software, #opendata, and #openhardware.
Slides: https://t.co/sMW0FnxcRX Video: https://t.co/8Lenbzafpu

item.title: #en @ 1435269347207958530
item.description:
We're super delighted to announce that the #PolicyShapers team will be hosting a session at @ccglobalsummit on Sept 24: How Open Data Can Drive Transparency and Transformation in Virtual Universities
Learn more & register here: https://t.co/12bsJTwL1Q
#CCGlobalSummit #opendata https://t.co/yPhcmMHinB

item.title: #en @ 1435264204882186247
item.description: We recently launched a Massive Open Online Course (MOOC), "Data for Better Lives: A New Social Contract" -- based on the World Development Report 2021. Check out the course's features, including the MOOC's role in global capacity building, here: https://t.co/tOyAeKID1i #WDR2021

item.title: #en @ 1435261090640941057
item.description: I am still settling into life at @wiko_berlin, and marvelling at their outstanding hospitality and organisation.. while I prepare to chat about #OpenScience and #OpenData with epidemiologists in Italy and #STS @Assist_UK scholars in the U.K. this week
